name: Sam Bolien
text: Paul’s,always willing to help me no matter what. I need a part for my truck and didn’t want to pay 80 dollars at the store call him and he said come on out I have two you can choose from. It’s like having a brothers helping hand. If I could give a 10 I would. Not too many of us left that would go out of there way to help, Thank you: PAUL

name: Robert Watson
text: Best salvage yard you will ever find as far as price goes. Guys that work there really know vehicles. Highly recommend! 5 Stars!

name: Sarah Barnes
text: Kindest junkyard  owner there is! Large selection of vehicles here and a lot of nice classics to gaze at too with the kid. Have gotten many parts from here and always satisfied with price.

name: Justin Farrar
text: This salvage yard is pretty big with a large variety. I found several trucks like mine. Also, They were so very very kind to me and let me get a small part I needed for free in appreciation for being a soldier. I recommend this place to mechanics or anyone who needs parts. I hope the business sees my review, you have earned my business for your kindness and if I ever need a hard to find part in the future, I assure you I will return here first! Thank you and god bless.

text: Great folks to deal with.they don't rip u off.very honest.we buy all of our parts from them..u will be glad to do business with them

name: Kayla Moore
text: I bought a 2001 Chrystler Town and Country. The same day I bought it I went to get an oil change and then pick up my kids from daycare and the tire started smoking. I almost broke down on the highway.  I got new break pads and the same thing is happening, plus a lot of other issues that I was not notified about before buying it. Now taking it to get looked at by a professional. I had it half a day. :(

name: Yvette G
text: Horrible experience. Went in for something super simple and can put with an even bigger problem. I purchased a windshield wiper arm. It was confirmed that the arm was for the year and make of my car. I asked if I could pay extra for him to put it on and he agreed. He wasn't able to put it on claiming that it was becuase I needed a nut. I noticed that the wipers were no longer working after he tried putting it on. He claimed the wiper motor was not working. The wiper motor was working completely fine prior to him touching my car. I took it to my trusted mechanic and it was confirmed that not only did the wiper arm Hammett sold me was NOT for my year and make car, but he also tore my wiper transmission when he ripped the arm off of it. Prior to me even going to Hammett, I took it by my mechanic to confirm what was needed. It was confirmed that I only needed the arm as the wiper motor and wiper transmission were perfectly fine in great condition, I had also driven the car in the rain the day before and the wiper worked just fine. I called and text  the guy who damaged the car and sent photos and I have yet to receive a response. Do not only did i pay $40 for an arm that doesn't fit my car (Oriellys Auto Parts confirmed that the Hammett arm was likely for a 2003 not a 2008), but I also had to pay $75 for the part Hammett broke as well as $75 for a brand new arm from The dealership. This was a $40 fix that ended up costing me $190! This is a real review. I would not suggest taking your car or buying any parts from this company. The honest thing to do would have been to at the very LEAST reimburse me for the arm that didn't fit the car. I gave them that opportunity by calling and texting prior to this review and I didn't receive any response back.

Jeremy,

I'm so sorry this happened.  Which department were you attempting to deliver material to?  I want to make sure this doesn't happen again, to you or anyone else.  Please call or come by and speak to management.  Our number is 256-892-0406.  We appreciate your feedback.  -Lea Medders

name: Frances Mendoza
text:
I called to get a vehicle towed and the first lady was nice, but another female in the background  was yelling and got on the phone, She would not let me explain i was having MY vehicle towed to my office. Very unprofessional.:
updated Your response is not correct in regard to that phone call The business was identified in the beginning of the conversation and your female associate was the only rude one. Had she stopped yelling I would have explained that that was fine but my personal vehicle also needed towing from a different location.

resp.text: We don’t do any Repo’s at all, someone in your office was trying to pull one over on us, acting like it was a normal tow which it was not… they failed to say it was a repo and then they got a attitude when we told them we don’t do them and if we did it would cost more than a regular local tow.

name: Spiritisalive1
text: Driver was very professional, arrived when he said he would. Handled all my business with a dealership in another county. Made the whole experience stress free. Definitely will use them again.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We're glad you had a good experience. Take care.

name: Janice Alldredge
text: I was denied  getting a receipt  from the driver.  Said, Ace towing didn't do that. I needed it for my  records. I sure would  appreciate it if you sent  us one. Driver was very nice.

resp.text: Hi Janice. Thank you for reviewing us and offering your sentiment. Please call us at (256) 571-7397 so we can further discuss. Thank you!

name: Ann Loyd
text: I've used Ace towing several times. I appreciate their service.  They have always taken good care in getting the job done and getting me back on the road. I highly recommend 👌

resp.text: Thanks for being a repeat patron, Ann! We appreciate the review!

name: James Derringer
text:
This company has been around for awhile and continue to hire new people. I never understood why they had such a high turn out until this year. The manager/owner has an absolutely terrible attitude with his staff. I don't care how cheap a business is if they treat the employees like this I will do my best to avoid them. I've personally witnessed his angry attitude while waiting to pick up my truck from a wreck. When you run a business your employees make it efficient. Without good employees you can't have a great business.

I wrote this for my grandpa, he is over 80 and asked me to help him.

resp.text: I hate you feel this way but 99% of the time when we hire new people Is because we are growing and buying more trucks so yes there is a lot of new people   And I like to hear more about this wreck your talking about call us so we can understand more what you are even talking about 256 571 7397

name: Heather Chandler
text: Great company! I have used them multiple times. Never a long estimated time of arrival. Always friendly. Help any way they can.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5-star rating of our towing service, Heather! We truly appreciate the feedback, take care!

name: Blake Welch
text: Jerry was a great service provider helped me get where I needed to go and was very friendly

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Blake. Call us if you need towing or roadside assistance in the future!

name: Shirlee Bailey
text:
This company was used by my insurance roadside assistants. They said that because I had All-State insurance they were not putting me first because All-State doesn't pay well. That tells me that it's not about who is in need of help, but how our insurance pays them. I sat on the road for almost 6 hours with 3 kids.
When I called the place in which my car was to be towed, they said it was never delivered.
My vehicle was still sitting on the road even after I was sent a text saying it would be picked up at 4:37-4:52, only it was moved about 600 feet to where we initially stopped. The kids built a pyramid of rocks while playing in the ditch, which was approximately 600 feet to where the car was. Which tells me they loaded it then put it back down. WHY IN THE WORLD WOULD YOU DO THAT? Never again.

resp.text: This was on a very busy day, we told this potential client that we would get to her once we were finished with the calls that had come in earlier. She demanded that we get to her first and after some very uncomfortable phone calls we decided that we did not want to do business with said potential client. We informed the roadside insurance of this decision.

name: Michelle Smith
text: If you want to be talked over when trying to speak or talked rude to this is the company to use. I called them to explain something just like my insurance company asked me to do. Jason was very rude telling me I shouldn’t even be dealing with him only my insurance company should call him. First off its our vehicle and I’ll call all I need to about it especially when instructed to do so by my insurance company. I was belittled and talked to rudely. Our company will not use them again. We also requested our truck be dropped off at home 3 miles from the accident. He said oh no let me take it to my lot so the insurance company will come out faster. Which we let him do and it cost us $2800.00 because they didn’t come out faster and it sat there from 6/26-8/21. I’ll say the lady in the office was always nice when I spoke with her but Jason who I believe is the owner has no customer service skills. When someone calls to ask about their vehicle you should be willing to answer any questions they have and be nice about it regardless if they have their insurance company involved or not. Especially when you’re telling me a different story then my insurance adjuster told me minutes before I called you.

resp.text: This was not a issue on Ace Towing this was matter of insurance wasn’t notified properly, and when they did come we had to do what they told us to do, we strive daily to help and be reliable to ALL our customers. Thanks

name: austin croslyn
text: If you need service and are seeking the best and most knowledgeable around, ask for Brandon Bartlett by name. Unprecedented knowledge and respect. 5/5 stars!

resp.text: Hello and thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you have nothing but amazing things to say about our team at ACE Towing LLC and what we offer.

name: Julie Pendergrass
text: When you call, ask for Brandon Bartlett for excellent customer service and support when you need it the most. He works hard and gets the job done in a timely manner.

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review! Our team always strives for the highest standards. We are delighted we made your experience a positive one. Hopefully you stay on the road with no issues, but if you ever need towing services again, we hope to hear from you. Take care!

name: Vickie Thompson
text: I use this wrecker service at all times. I have had to call them to unlock my car they were quick and they had good timing since I had left my car running and it was summer time. I've had to use the towing service on numerous occasions. The service is great my cars have never been damaged. I have heard from several people that when their car was towed it was damaged but not from this company. I know several people that's always used Ace Towing. My family uses Ace Towing as their primary towing company. They towed my car to the location I need it for its repairs or to my own home so I do not have bills for it being in the Wrecker lot. As for this service is a one place that I recommend to anyone who's in a situation of needing towed or if their car has been locked up and there are locked out. I like the speediness of them getting to where I'm at when I need them.

text: Dismal. Aluminum,  metals must be at an all time low. They do not take aluminum  cans any longer either.

name: Valerie Gray
text: Always responsive to our needs and community minded.  If you don’t know who to ask for something, call Teague.  The container business is quick to respond and the best prices around!

name: Breanna Miller
text: My husband and I rented a dumpster from them while we were remodeling our house and we had a great experience! They have great prices and are easy to do business with.

name: Naomi Wadkins
text: Teague Inc has supplied container for all of our construction sites for several years. Very friendly and helpful. Containers are the best prices around and the quickest turn around.

name: Kari Sims
text: Always the best service, goes out of their way to help, and always there when you need them. The kindest and most helpful people!

name: Jenna Landrum
text: Best container service around, hands down! Very responsive, personable customer service! Will always do business with Teague Inc!

name: Russell Lauderdale
text: Teagues is the best!  They’re always very helpful and efficient.  Any time we have needed them they are there!!

name: K.L.W T2025
text: Teague, Inc. is an Industrial Scrap Metal & Roll Off - Container Service. All scrap metal including steel, aluminum, iron, copper, etc., is purchased at current market prices.  Highly recommend!

name: Tashina Coleman
text: Best container service. Thank you for your great service!

name: Kimberly Carter
text: Love them! Super friendly and prompt.

name: robin meadows
text: Best service around with Very friendly staff!!

name: Wanda Moncus
text: Very friendly and easy to do business with.

name: Bethany Roughton
text: Always the best customer service!

name: Ray Hester
text: They don't pay u wate they give you what they wont to give u . Only hard what its worth when Columbus pays u .65 for cans they only haft . On every thing I don't like  to b ripoff!!!!!!!

name: Steve Jennings
text: RIP off

name: Michael Dunlap
text: Great price on parts.  Very courteous people.  Great service I'll definitely be going back

resp.text: Thank u Michael we appreciate the kind review hope we can help u again soon

name: Dare InDreams
text: Worst place to buy parts. They try to force you to go to his mechanic and spend triple the money. Really bad customer service . Would not recommend to buy from here

resp.text: You can’t please everyone. Before buying, we explained to the customer that they would have to use a certified transmission shop to install to carry our warranty. The customer never could do that so we just refunded their money back. How that is bad business? I do not know, and we do not make a dime off of installation. We just refer to good mechanics who know what they are doing.

name: Dee Tee
text: Great prices, and parts were in stock worth the drive from Birmingham

resp.text: Thank u Dee glad we could help

name: yeet
text: needed an aux port for my corolla and it wasn't listed on their website but I went there and got the part in about 10 minutes. great service, great price, and it works great. highly recommended

resp.text: Thanks a lot hope we can help again soon

name: Armando Pena Garcia
text: Always friendly people nice people to talk to great prices on parts

resp.text: THANK U ARMANDO FOR THE KIND REVIEW

name: K Pacpons
text: Great price for the part we needed, very friendly staff, and the most organized salvage yard I've ever seen.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank u so much for the kind words hope to have u back soon

name: Tia Wells
text: When I called in the later hours closer to their closing time. The female that took the call, very short with me. Interrupted me when I was asking a question. Overall rude. When I called earlier, a little after 2pm CST, The female that took the call was patient and helpful. But 1 person will spoil a rating

resp.text: Sorry to hear that we will try and work on that sometimes it’s hard to answer the phone at closing time and u still have a office full of customers that are waiting for service please understand but I do not think that is worth a one star rating we try our best to help everyone but it can get hectic at times especially at closing

name: Kevin Wells
text: Good people. Good parts

resp.text: Thanks Kevin

name: Bradford Abele
text: Great place to buy car parts for a low price.

name: Adam McDowell
text: Best experience I've ever had with an auto salvage business. I was almost speechless when I walked in and saw the employees. They were friendly and clean cut, not some old, bitter, burned out junkyard slug.lol I expected to wait for a while for them to remove the strut I was purchasing from a car but I was in & out in ten minutes tops! I even found a mass air sensor I've been looking for, for my BMW!! I will be back!!

name: Nick Scott
text: Awesome place for good used parts. Owner is super nice and tentative to his customers.  Was a pleasure doing business with them and will for sure go back. Also you can't beat the price on his parts. Hope this helps anyone thats looking for used parts.

name: david amoroso
text: I called several places for used Toyota Sequoia rear axle assembly. Bobby's offered me one for $400.00 with delivery and it included everything from driveshaft, yoke, coils and even bump stops...WOW! everywhere else I called was well over $1,500 just for the axle itself. The axle assembly worked out great and was exactly what I needed....THANK YOU!

name: Greg Cate
text:
Jared and Tina do a great job..
Very very knowledgeable and empathic!!!

resp.text: Thank u Mr Cate

name: Antony Santy
text: Nice place too many parts chip prices

resp.text: Thank u for the kind words

name: Sandy Miller
text: Gave us the wrong part and argued that it wasn't and didn't want to correct the problem with either the right part or a refund at first. Then called my husbands job which had nothing to do with our transaction with them and banned my husband from the property when he made a complaint about it. Really poor business practices and terrible customer service.  Do Not Recommend!!

resp.text: Not how this went down at all but I hope someone else can take care of y’all better than we can oh by the way we refunded the money back what else can we do since y’all bought the only part we had but thanks for the negative review

name: Chris Riley
text: Great prices and great service!

resp.text: Thanks Chris always appreciate good customers

name: Matthew Heath
text: Prob the cleanest used auto store I've ever been in. I love that they deliver and that they have a huge yard of parts and inventory. I would gladly refer them to every person I know.

resp.text: thank u for your business Mr Kelley

Este es uno de los mejores lugares para comprar partes los precios son muy razonables

name: Erin Muldoon
text: Staff was friendly. Instructions were clear. Recycled cans and a dryer. Got more than we expected. Next time we have scrap, we'll be back. 😊

resp.text: Erin, thank you for your review!  We at SA Recycling strive to always provide the best customer service and competitive prices.  Can't wait to see you back!

name: Joseph Vinson
text: For one we was first in and out took 45 mins to get fully unloaded had to to unload by hand while the workers used the machines to crush little metal pipes and separate small pieces and also when we got in the warehouse it took another 35 mins with everything separated already I've had better experiences there but the past few times I've been there it's been bad

name: Daniel Rather
text: This place is a joke. I got paid for $55 with a check that nobody will cash!! I am now sitting on side of the road out of gas,  because nobody will cash it! (Even Walmart....) I will be calling the better business bureau!  And immigration !!!

resp.text:
Daniel, thank you for reaching out. There are three local places that will cash your check – Wells Fargo, Check into Cash, and Cash Express. We have included their business information below. All of our employees are legal to work for SA Recycling. Immigration Enforcement is welcome at our yard at any time.

Check into Cash
519 Avalon Ave Suite 14C
Muscle Shoals, AL 35660
(256)381-2480

Wells Fargo
102 E Dr Hicks Blvd
Florence, AL 35630
(256)768-3420

Cash Express
1007 Woodward Ave
Muscle Shoals, AL 35661
(256)314-0085

name: Cameron_Fowler22
text: I've been going to SA Recycling for the past few months and selling all of my scrap. The staff is very friendly and their prices are great

resp.text: Thank you for leaving such an awesome review, Cameron! We are happy to have you as a customer and look forward to working with you again soon.

name: Seth Bullock
text: I went to the scarp yard in Florence and they said they’d be open and they wasn’t. SA was very friendly and offered me a good price for my scrap metal. I’ll definitely be back when I have more scrap metal.

name: Edgar Marchan
text: They need to update the info on your website, will not be coming here

resp.text: Hi Edgar, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We have updated our website and social media pages to correct the hours of our location in Sheffield. If there is anything else we can do to improve your customer experience please reach out to our customer service department at 1-800-468-7272. We look forward to hearing from you! Thank you.

name: Josh Phillips
text:
I was given a old central unit to scrap. On the first visit to TVR I was told I needed to have an invoice from where my friend bought a new unit, and a bill of sale showing he sold/gave it to me.
After obtaining the exact documents they told me I needed they still refused to accept it.
When I asked to speak with the manager I was told he already decided they would not accept it. He didn't even have the common decency to come lie to my face.
I will never bother going there again. I would also recommend others go elsewhere as well.
There are several scrap yards in the shoals area.

name: Howard Starcher
text: Closes at 3 used to close at 4

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a review, Howard. We recently updated the hours of operation on all of our web pages. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Dennis Chaney
text: It's okay

name: Just Maze
text: Busy place! Got in & out weight was good 👍

name: Jason Towery
text: My experience was very speedy and professional are you choking and their price was decent. The only complaint is roads through the yard is very rough and full of nails. So if you plan on visiting make sure you bring a spare tire or at least a plug kit. In my experience at least 6 out of 10 times that I've driven through the yard I've ended up with a piece of metal or nail and one of my tires

name: Heath Teer
text: Good scrapyard, no issues here.  They take most everything.  Refrigerators and other appliances are good to kick off the truck for shred price.  They also have a separate price for separated non-ferrous stainless, which some yards in the area do not.

name: Jeff Viehland
text: They offer a fair rate, nice people in office, advice could use a sweeper every day to avoid customer flat tires.

name: ter b
text: Customer service is great it was my first time and they were very professional

name: Davey Kirby
text: Nice place but got check an wasn't good for 2 hrs didn't understand that but still great place

name: marino dominguez
text: Very good.

name: Aguilar Business
text:
700.dollars load bales of scrap from florida.
Cost me to replace 2 tires and over 1,000 dollars to repair my fb trayler.
Crane op.need more Training .
To my fellow drivers be ready to Keep pro ves. OSHA.

resp.text: We do not do any business with "Aguilar Business"   We are a local Scrap yard and buy from the Birmingham area markets.

text: Had no problem with them

Good management

Only one rude employ with over 30 min before close time he was using curse words and very bad attitude but Mr.Willie put him in his place and finished buisness properly.. Thanks to Alabama's employees who know how to handle buisness correctly have a great holiday!!!

name: david marshall
text: They get you paid but you can't see the scale to know if you are getting the right price

text:
In and out and smooth sailing. They unloaded the truck and I was on my way to my next junk removal job. The
If I could give them 20 stars I would.

text: GREAT place to scrap your recyclables!! Mr. WILLIE and the guys will get you in and out with precision and ASM also offers you the highest prices in Mobile !!!

quick
easy
pays the most

name: Warren Early
text: Great place to do business with

text: Good prices on scrap

name: Danielle “PersonalitybyDanielle” Simms
text: Best in the Scrap business!!!

name: j champ
text: Professional & easy to deal with!

name: Rickey Hooper
text: The operator was helpful and friendly

name: wilbur cornner
text: Great people and got part I needed..at great price...

name: Bacon Reach
text: Great experience wonderful people and great pricing

name: Eric Mosley
text: Was very nice on the phone and helped me find part I needed. Pricing was very fair.

name: Supa CG
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Called and asked for a specific part. They give me a part but off the wrong year car. One difference... there was a sway bar tab on the year car I own that was missing. I had someone else go pick it up for me and did not get to see it until the part was at my home. They knew this was the case keep in mind... I go back the next day to try and replace it and they didn’t have it. They then would not refund me. The part was picked and sold to my mother after being very specific about what I needed and they just made a mistake. No biggie but it is ridiculous to not make good on it... they tried to convince me that I should just put it on and not attach the sway bar and after that the thought I would let him weld a tab on there. No way. I don’t trust his judgement and measurements to the precision that they might need to be at. Especially seeing as how he was pissed with me. 0 stars

name: Honey Ledlow
text: Very friendly.

name: Blu
text: Great service

name: jake burkey
text: Spoke with a person on the phone a week ago.  They said they had 8 axles in stock that i wanted to buy.  He stated they had more that they would pull for me and have all of them ready when i got there (12 total).  I spoke to a person yesterday evening who said they had them ready to go and to come down the following day.  I drove 2 hours and they did not have the axles pulled.  They also ONLY HAD ONE ON SITE!!!  They never had the axles.  I sent pictures of what i was looking for and they said they had them.  How is it possible to say you have 8-12 of something, state you have them ready, and never had them in the first place????

name: E W
text: Terrible experience.  Very unprofessional and do not stand behind their parts.  Engine was trash.

name: Google User
text: Fantastic. They Always have the stuff we need. Most of the time it's waiting on us.

name: Thomas Robertson
text: Great pricing very helpful awesome customer service

name: Cyndi Roy
text: Nice people and had all the parts I needed

name: k.o. Benovis
text: Great people great prices

name: Jack Norris
text: Great service and products!  Extremely helpful knowledgeable and friendly! Will always choose this place first. If they have it I will get it here first. Thank you for all your help and for being there for us when we need any parts!

name: Supa CG
text: Absolutely love living right down the street from this auto salvage yard. I have bought parts from this place on several occasions and I've always been treated with a fairly as well as been given decent prices. Particularly, in regards to their competitors. This is my go-to place for anything that I need to get my little rinky-dink car back on the road.

name: Kenny Beck
text: Puts you on hold forever , could drive there quicker than they would pick back up. Never calls back like they claim they will. Prices not that great, this is used parts not new!

name: Project Dan H
text: Frankie was the friendliest Auto Salvage professional I have ever done businesses with.  They are a great staff and they were very reasonable with the prices.   Woodstock auto was a pleasure.  Thank you.

name: Mickey Bond
text: Very nice and great prices will help you out when needed

name: Steve Crow
text: Bought used engine from here was told it was ran before i bought it.installed engine in my truck smoked very badly misfired and bad i ternal engine noise will never buy anything from this place again $605 dollars down drain

text: Good parts at a fair price.

text: Very good friendly service

text: In and out pretty quick.  No major issues.

name: J D
text: Scrap side was good. Other side for copper was a little slow and stupid to say the least... Never again!
